title: Happily unmarried
creator_credit: Anne Wheeler, Lorna Rasmussen, Tom Radford and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Joyce Rasmussen and her 25-year-old daughter Lorna have both chosen to live without partners. Joyce is divorced; Lorna has chosen to remain single. But they are friends and they talk openly about coping as “singles” in this couple-oriented society, and about their attitudes on such issues as monogamy and collective households.
